name: Helios
description: Helios is a source finder, it scrapes third-party sites (called providers) that are publicly available on the internet.
author: Davy

changeLogs.3.0.1:
Scraping is faster than ever
You can now add more that one provider URL
When playing an episode Helios will try to queue the next one
View sources while scraping
Improved stats tab
changeLogs.2.1.9:
Add option to enable/disable automatic open remote
Ability to hide keyboard via enter key
Handle episodes-item-option action
changeLogs.2.1.8: Fix issue when trying to open video on browser
changeLogs.2.1.4:
Add option Let Me Choose as default action
Bug fixes
changeLogs.2.1.3: iOS: Add Play on nPlayer option
changeLogs.2.0.9: Select best source < 5gb if user has only a free PM account
changeLogs.2.0.8:
- Open source list if no sources found
- Don't test links on free Premiumize account to avoid burning free limit
changeLogs.2.0.4: For RD, opening on browser will open RD player on their website
changeLogs.2.0.3: Fix: Episodes not cached on RD but actually cached
changeLogs.2.0.1: Fix: quality filter wasn't applied on torrents
changeLogs.2.0.0:
- Lot of refactoring to simplify new updates.
- Big play button which will find the best source for you
- If you pick a source manually for an episode, Helios will try to find the equivalent source for the next episode (base on file name)
- The cup icon is the best source found By Helios. The one the Big play button will use
- Reorder/Toggle actions
- Add stats tab
